title: patching 4.18
body:
i am patching 4.18 but it always get stuck on 84-86% and when i look at the KBps it says 0 but i checked my connection and its normal.
has anyone else had this problem? and how do i fix it???

replies.body:
try changing it to another region, then changing back to NA. Don't let the other region load the entire game differences, just let the updater notice the difference, then go back to NA and see if that renews your connection.
IF not try disabling and re-enabling peer to peer transfer and see if that makes a difference. 
Also, make sure that youre not trying to update over wireless.
oh, then I already got it.
